SQL: SELECT RSM.SUB_NAME, RSM.UNIT, RSD.AMOUNT, RSM.SUB_NUMBER, RSM.SPECIFICATION_TYPE, RSM.UUID, RSS.UUID as STORAGEID FROM REP_SUBSTANCE_STORAGE RSS LEFT JOIN REP_STORAGE_DETAIL RSD ON RSD.NUMBERID = RSS.UUID LEFT JOIN REP_SUBSTANCE_MESSAGE RSM ON RSM.UUID = RSD.MESSAGEID WHERE STORAGE_NUMBER='${storenum}'
